lines.text: Do you know what he did with that ticket I gave him? He and his son played tic-tac-toe on the back of it. You'd think people would grow up enough to know that the law doesn't belong to the cops; it belongs to them!
You wanna' join us for a drink?
No thanks, we have to leave now.
Well, you gas up the car, why not gas up the driver?
They're gonna' keep chickening us, that's what they're gonna' do! They wanna' crack us up!
These kids have no place to go and they want to get there at 150 miles an hour.
Let's see you laugh with these nails in your face!
